content:
In this dataset, people are asked whether they believe a tweet contains hatespeech or not. 0 means no hatespeech, and 1 means that there is hatespeech.

Now you will make your prediction (if you are unsure, just give your best estimate.) Your output should be an integer label:
Target Example:
Text: `These Offend Me =atheists,abominations,queers, satanism, pedophilism,lgbt,porn,communism,socialism izlamoeslem terrorism nwoglobalism fascist ism antifaism blmism,secularism corrupt demonicratism,illegals all related filthy problems if u dont believe in GOD, u have NO morals-Law sense ALL the Same
Annotation from annotator:
Your output should be a single integer corresponding to the label.
